channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Delft University of Technology on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Input-to-State Stable Coupled Oscillator Networks for Closed-form Model-based Control in Latent Space
item.description: Stable closed-loop control in latent space is achieved using a novel Coupled Oscillator Network, offering efficient model-based control for complex nonlinear systems directly from image data.

item.title: UNION: Unsupervised 3D Object Detection using Object Appearance-based Pseudo-Classes
item.description: UNION: Unsupervised 3D object detection method doubles average precision, leveraging LiDAR, camera, and temporal data for efficient training without manual labels.
